faq.title: Frequently asked questions
faq.1a:
We have 2 types of users. On the one hand the users themselves and on the other hand the traders:
  • The users pay nothing and have all functions immediately available. There are no hidden costs.
  • The traders can make their business stand out by making special offers to the users, e.g. in the case of a restaurant, a free espresso with a turnover more than 30 euros. The type of offers is left to the traders themselves.
faq.2a:
We want to gain maximum trust and are in no way out of collecting or selling data. We are convinced that users and traders will create a stable ecosystem on the basis of ${appTitle}, through which everyone has a great advantage and no disadvantages. That's why ${appTitle}'s source code is publicly available, so everyone can see what's stored in the code and how the data is further processed. You can find the source code here:
https://github.com/maniafschar
faq.3: How does your business model work?
faq.3a: Business people can buy additional services. These are only actively shown for matching matches. There is no such thing as classic-style advertising.
faq.4: So do I see advertising everywhere in the app?
faq.4a: No. You will only be shown advertising if an offer from a trader matches your settings. You get offers e.g. only because you like to eat Italian, you are close to the place and it fits into your budget. Classic-style advertising is not shown.
faq.5a: No, we won't show your email to anyone. Your exact whereabouts will of course not be displayed either. Users can see that you are within 1.5 kilometers of them.
faq.6: Can I delete my profile again?
faq.6a:
You can easily delete your profile in the settings. The data is then completely and irrevocably gone, a recovery is not possible.
Despite the simple deletion option, our goal is to gain sustainable users who use our app in the long term and who are authentic. This simplified deletion process therefore primarily serves to build trust.

info.url: Link for sending in other Apps like WhatsApp:

intro.bluetooth:
• If you open ${appTitle}, Bluetooth Matching scans your immediate surrounding for suitable buddies. If there is a match, you will receive a message
  • There are many other ways in which we match, e.g. when a buddy with the same interests looks at a location that you have saved as a favorite
  • Additionally Guide show Buddies with similar interests their view of your city
intro.bluetoothDescriptionBrowser:
Bluetooth Matching
As soon as you have installed our app, you can find suitable people in your immediate vicinity via Bluetooth matching.
The browser is still too stupid, it doesn't support Bluetooth.
intro.bluetoothDescriptionOff:
Bluetooth Matching
Your Bluetooth is turned off. Activate it to start Bluetooth matching.
intro.chatDescription:
Chats
After logging in, you will see the list of buddies with whom you have already chatted.
intro.contacts:
Networking
We match users according to the following criteria, which you can specify in your settings:
  • Attributes you value in others
  • Age
  • Gender
  • Budget
Log in and you will see people in your area with similar interests here.
intro.detail:
The detail page contains
  • contact data
  • describtion of the location
  • reachability of the location
  • map
  • various buttons to e.g. add locations to your favorites.
intro.contacts: Sobald Du eingeloggt bist, siehst Du hier die Kontakte in Deiner Umgebung.
intro.home:
Sometimes you want to get out of the rut and discover new things. ${appTitle} helps
  • to match contacts with same interests, e.g. dog lovers or concert goers
  • to find new locations/events through Guides
We do it in the following way...
intro.homeImage: Add your profile picture, a short self-description and other information here.
intro.homeInvite:
Invite your friends. The bigger the community, the more matches with:
  • Buddies in your immediate vicinity via Bluetooth Matching
  • for spontaneous activities with Today I want...
  • for small events with buddies that suit you
You can invite your friends on the Info page.
intro.homeLocation:
Enter new locations... advantages:
  • as soon as a Buddy clicks your location and fits to you, you receive a note and may get in contact
  • You will be informed about all events in your location

You see, it's worth it! Examples for locations:
  • a nice sight in the mountains
  • starting point of a cool bike tour
  • a new restaurant/museum
intro.listExplained:
Lists consist of the picture, information and the butterfly with
  • distance information including compass
  • category
  • favorite status
  • rating
By clicking the butterfly, you can rate the entry.
intro.listFilter:
Lists may be filtered by
  • categories
  • cardinal directions
  • districts
In contrast to the search, in which new data is fetched from the server, the filter only acts on the list elements that have already been loaded.
intro.listMenu:
The app follows these concepts
  • on the bottom you find the menu including Locations, Buddies, Search and What's up? (as soon as you are logged in, you see all of them)
  • Clicking on one of the menu items opens the submenu
intro.locations:
Locations${separator}Events
Events take place in locations. Anyone can create locations and events, e.g. a regulars' table. You alone decide who can see the event:
  • You and your friends
  • You, your friends and buddies that suit you
  • Everyone
Finding new buddies to do things together becomes so easy.
intro.menuOpen: You are back to the list. Click here to re-open the menu.
intro.register: After registration, we will show you how you can individualize your profile. Thank you for taking the time for this intro.
intro.settings:
spontify.me
Are you looking for more spontaneity in your life from time to time? For example if:
  • Your friends don't have time, but you still want to do something
  • You are in a foreign city for business or pleasure
  • You like to organize events, to whom new people are welcome to join you and your friends
spontify.me is the right app for you in such cases. We try our best to create friendships and spontaneity here and to suppress sex requests or the like.
intro.settingsLoggedIn:
• Change your profile image and enter general information here
  • Swipe left to enter attributes that describe you and that you like about other people
  • provide yourself as a guide for people fitting your settings
intro.whattodo:
Any plans for today?
Would you like to do something spontaneously?

In contrast to events, you can indicate here what you would like to do today, e.g. go out to eat or visit a museum, etc.

The activity will be Buddies who suit you and are no further than 50 KM away. After 24 hours at the latest, the activity is deleted again.

landing.block1Title: What does everyday life look like without ${appTitle} aus?
landing.block1_1: You mostly go to the same places
landing.block1_2: You hardly meet new buddies with same interests
landing.block2_1: Like-minded, e.g. dog lovers or concert goers, find eachother quickly
landing.block2_2: Guides show new perspectives on the city
landing.block3_1: Bluetooth matching shows you the right people in your immediate vicinity
landing.block3_2: Anyone can set up small events that are open to people with the same interests
landing.history:
A couple of friends had the idea at the end of the 90s during the Tamagochi madness: to develop a small, digital device that allows you to indicate your interests. If strangers with the same interests meet, the device would inform both of them. It would be easy to get in touch, because you have a topic of conversation right away.

This idea in combination with the smartphone age and Bluetooth create a perfect basis for our ${appTitle}. The aim is to get to know new people with the same interests spontaneously and without a dating background.

${appTitle} matches buddies, locations and events according to the preferences entered by the you and offers the following features:
landing.history2: Small, private events for friends and like minded buddies.
landing.history3: Bluetooth matching with buddies in your immediate vicinity.

login.hints:
As a registered user you can
  • see and chat with Buddies
  • find Buddies with similar interests within your immediate surrounding with Bluetooth Matching
  • find Guides or offer yourself as a guide
  • add locations to your favorites and receive notifications when buddies, who suit you, are also interested in the location
  • participate in events or post your own
  • and much more
